name: write coordinates
desc: Write_Coordinates provides a means to export an ASCII file containing the coordinates (and optionally the data) of any object in EVS.

properties.name: Use Application Origin
properties.desc: When true, the module will apply the Application Origin. When false, coordinates will be left in internal model space.

properties.name: File Delimiter
properties.desc: File Delimiter allows you to specify the delimiter for the output file. The default value is a comma. There is one special delimiter the tag <TAB> which will tab delimit the output file.

properties.name: Write Nodal Data
properties.desc: The Write Nodal Data toggle causes all nodal data to be included in the file.

properties.name: Exponentiate Log Data
properties.desc: The Exponentiate Log Data tells the module that all data with log units should be exponentiated when written out.

properties.name: Write Node Number
properties.desc: The Write Node Number toggle causes the node numbers to be included in the file.

properties.name: Append To File
properties.desc: The Append to File toggle causes the data to be appended to an existing file and suppresses the header line for the appended data section.
